I noticed you were looking for a war-themed movie, and I think I have just the thing! Have you considered "Schindler's List" (1993)? It's a powerful historical drama that tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German industrialist who saves the lives of thousands of Jews during the Holocaust. With an outstanding cast, including Liam Neeson and Ralph Fiennes, this film is a must-see for anyone interested in war stories.

If you're looking for something a bit more modern, "Black Hawk Down" (2001) is another great option. This intense drama follows a group of U.S. soldiers as they fight to survive in Somalia during the infamous Battle of Mogadishu. With an all-star cast and intense action sequences, this film is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!
